plot: The story of You and Me, before and after love. It Remains is an artistic short film told through three different languages: dance, music, and film. It tells the universal story of how easy it is to fall both in and out of love.
title: It Remains
plot_es: The story of You and Me, before and after love. It Remains is an artistic short film told through three different languages: dance, music, and film. It tells the universal story of how easy it is to fall both in and out of love.
plot_en: The story of You and Me, before and after love. It Remains is an artistic short film told through three different languages: dance, music, and film. It tells the universal story of how easy it is to fall both in and out of love.
